Articles.Content:
Okay so this is what happened. I was just on a "Kethane Scanning Tutorial". I had clicked on the resources and i wanted to close it but when i clicked it, i couldn't. That was the same when i right clicked the scanner and tried to deactivate it. Even the esc button didn't pause the game. I could only press the brakes and gear and space center and stuff. When i clicked space center, i spammed the esc key and it brung me to the pause menu, i clicked quit to main menu, I was at the menu where you could load or start a new save or go to a scenario. In the background was kerbin with the grids from kethane. You know those buttons I was talking about on the menu, they were grayed out and un-clickable. I have 0.90,Mods are Kethane, B9 aerospace, DEMV 4, texture replacer, mechjeb, procedural fairings, KW rocketry , kerbal foundries, KAS , Hull camera thing, BD armoury, and chatterer. Pls answer ASAP, I really want to start playing again.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-13T00:19:59Z" title="04/13/2015 12:19  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 13, 2015</time> by Djslime6764**

> 
> are you going to help me? or are you looking into it or do you not care? just askin

Simmer down bro. Just because a thread got moved doesn't mean it's been ignored. The Mods move threads to the appropriate place so that they can get the help they need. From what I can tell Kethane is broken in .90, I suggest removing it and attempting to duplicate the issue.

> 
> Simmer down bro. Just because a thread got moved doesn't mean it's been ignored. The Mods move threads to the appropriate place so that they can get the help they need. From what I can tell Kethane is broken in .90, I suggest removing it and attempting to duplicate the issue.

I don't know what you're talking about, i was never angry or stressed out. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-13T21:25:56Z" title="04/13/2015 09:25  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 13, 2015</time> by Djslime6764**
